SA15n1258:8: yadanugatākāraṃ jñānaṃ tadanugatavastunibandhanaṃ yathā bahuṣu puṣpeṣu srak sragiti jñānaṃ |
SA15n1258:9: asti ca parasparasamparkavikalakalāsu kāryyādivyaktiṣvanugatākāraṃ vijñānaṃ tadanaikāntikatādoṣākrāntaśarīratvānna tadbhāvasādhanāyālaṃ |
SA15n1258:10: yato bhavati bahuṣu pācakeṣu pācakaḥ pācaka iti ekākāraparāmarśapratyayaḥ |
SA15n1258:16: sātiśayatve vā pratikṣaṇaṃ viśarārūśarīratvāt kriyā kuta iti doṣoduṣpariharaḥ |
SA15n1258:19: bhinnānāmapyabhinnākārajñānanibandhanatve vyaktīnāmapi tathā bhāvo na rāja daṇḍanivāritaḥ |
SA15n1258:21: iti mūlaharaṃ pakṣamāśrayatā devānāṃ priyeṇa suṣṭha anukūlamācaritaṃ |
SA15n1258:23: pākakriyātvanibandhanaḥ pācakeṣvanugatākāraḥ pratyayastato nānaikāntikatādoṣa ityapi na mantavyaṃ |
SA15n1258:26: syādetat samavetasamavāyasambandhabalāt pākakriyāsāmānyaṃ pācakeṣvabhinnākāraṃ parāmarśapratyayamupajanayati tato na yathoktadoṣaḥ |
SA15n1258:29: vinaṣṭe karmmaṇi tat sāmānyaṃ na karmmaṇi tadabhāvādeva nāpi karttarīti sambadvasambandhopyasya nāstīti nābhinnapratyayahetuḥ |
SA15n1258:32: yathaiva hi parasparāsaṅkīrṇasvabhāvā api śābaleyādayobhāvāḥ kayācideva tadekakāryyapratiniyamalakṣaṇayā svahetubalāyātayā prakṛtyā tadekamabhimatamanugatarūpamupakurbbate,
SA15n1258:34: tathā tamekaṃ parāmarśapratyayamupajanayantu kimantarālagaḍunā vyatirekavatā sāmānyenopagatena |
SA15n1258:36: etacca sāmānyāpalāpibhirapi niyatamabhyupagamanīyaṃ anyathā kutaḥ śālivījaṃ śālyaṅkurameva janayati na kodravāṅkuramiti |
SA15n1258:39: tathāhi vayamapyevaṃ śaktā eva vaktuṃ sāmānyamevopakarttuṃ śaktivyaktīnāṃ bhedāviśeṣe'pi na tadekaṃ vijñānamupajanayitumiti |
SA15n1258:40: anuttaraṃ vata doṣasaṅkaṭamatrabhavān dṛṣṭidoṣeṇa praviśyamāno'pi nātmānamātmanā sambedayate |
SA15n1258:41: tathāhi śālivījatadaṅkurayoradhyakṣānupalambhanibandhane kāryyakāraṇabhāve'vagate śālivījaṃ śālyaṅkuraṃ janayituṃ śaktaṃ na kodravāṅkuramiti śakyamabhidhātuṃ |
SA15n1258:50: tathā hyatrāsidvirbhavantī svarūpato viśeṣaṇato vā bhavet |
SA15n1258:65: yathaiva hi prakāśakāntaranirapekṣaḥ prakāśaḥ prakāśamāna ātmanaḥ prakāśaka ucyate |
SA15n1258:69: yathāprakāre ca svasambedanaśabdārtha vivakṣite na kiñcid vacanīyakamasti kuto yathoktadoṣāvasaraḥ |
SA15n1258:72: tathānabhyupagame vā na sāmānyabalena vā kuleyādiṣvanugatākārau dhīdhvanī syātāṃ |
SA15n1258:73: na hi yato yatra jñānābhidhānapravṛttistadanupalakṣaṇe tasya pratītirbhavati, daṇḍivat |
SA15n1258:77: atha na pratipadyase tadā tasyāsidvatvādāśrayāsidvo hetuḥ |
SA15n1258:79: yato na vayaṃ vahīrūpatayā sāmānyaṃ dharmmitayā'ṅgīkurmmahe |
SA15n1258:81: sa ca svasambedanapratyakṣasidvatayā na śakyaḥ pratikṣeptuṃ |
SA15n1258:87: evambidhe ca dharmmiṇi vivakṣite kuta āśrayāsidvidoṣaḥ |
SA15n1258:92: idameva hi pratyakṣasya pratyakṣatvaṃ yat svarūpasya svabudvau samarpaṇaṃ |
SA15n1258:93: idaṃ punarmūlyādānakrayi sāmānyaṃ svarūpañca nādarśayati pratyakṣatāñca svīkarttumicchati |
SA15n1258:110: sati ca cakṣurādisākalye dṛśye vastunyavikalāpratibadvaśaktikāraṇaṃ pratyakṣaṃ jñānamiti svabhāvahetuḥ |
SA15n1258:115: tādvetoḥ prastutavastusidvau sidvamasattvaṃ sāmānyasyetyalamatibadvavistaravisāriṇyā kathayeti viramyate |
SA15n1258:118: vyakterevāsau pratibhāsa iti cet ko'parastarhi sāmānyasyānugatākāra iti cet |
SA15n1258:120: jātibyaktayoḥ samavāyabalādavibhāvitavibhāgayoḥ kṣīrodakayoriva parasparamiśraṇena pratipatteriti cet |
SA15n1258:122: svarūpāgrahaṇe'nayorapyagrahaṇamiti nirālambanaiva sā tādṛśī pratipattiriti paramārtha āveditastāvat nirālambanayā ca pratītyā vyavasthāpyamānaṃ sāmānyaṃ suvyavasthāpitaṃ |
SA15n1258:124: sapakṣe varttamāno virudva ityapi na mantavyaḥ |
SA15n1258:127: yadi hi sannapi tatra na pravarttayet |
SA15n1258:130: vyāvarttamāno'sadvyavahāre viśrāmyatīti atastenāsadvyavahāreṇānupalambho vyāpyata iti kuto'nekāntaḥ |
SA15n1258:137: pratyakṣapratibhāsi vartmana pañcasvaṅgulīṣu sthitaṃ sāmānyaṃ pratibhāsate na ca vikalpākārabudvau tathā |
SA15n1258:138: tā evāsphuṭamūrttayotra hi vibhāsante na jātistataḥ
